explain: everything that exists in a particular environment
an animal that lives by killing and eating other animals
a series of types of living things in which each one uses the next lower member of the series as a source of food
a group of animals or plants that are similar and can produce young animals or plants
decided or controlled by something else
an animal that is caught and eaten by another animal
to cause (something) to end or no longer exist
something that a person or place is known for making or producing very well
used to describe people who hurt others and do not feel sorry about it
statement: An ecosystem includes living things and nonliving things.
The population of rabbits is controlled by natural predators.
Sharks eat fish that are lower in the food chain.
There are approximately 8,000 species of ants.
Whether we go to the beach or not is dependent on the weather.
The lion was hunting for its prey.
The girl was terrified after watching the horror movie.
I can't trust someone who is cruel to animals.
